org.framed.orm.ui.editor

Class ORMGraphicalEditorActionBarContributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.ui.part.EditorActionBarContributor
      • org.eclipse.gef.ui.actions.ActionBarContributor
        • org.framed.orm.ui.editor.ORMGraphicalEditorActionBarContributor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionBarContributor

    public class ORMGraphicalEditorActionBarContributor
extends org.eclipse.gef.ui.actions.ActionBarContributor
    This is the ActionBarContributor for the ORMMultiPageEditor/ ORMGraphicalEditor, which adds UndoRetargetAction, RedoRetargetAction, DeleteRetargetAction, gridaction and snapaction to the workbench actionbar.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski, Lars Schuetze

      • setActiveEditor

        public void setActiveEditor(org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart editor)
        Sets the active editor for the contributor and updates the workbench actionbar. This method is called from the ORMMultiPageEditor.pageChange(int) when user switch between behaviour editor and data editor.
        Specified by:
        setActiveEditor in interface org.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionBarContributor
